explains: adj. 响亮的；轰动的；彻底的
v. 回响（resound 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: There was a resounding slap as Andrew struck him violently across the face.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁狠狠地打了他一记耳光，声音清晰响亮。

sentences.en: His resounding voice continued to resound in my ears long after he was out of sight.
sentences.cn: 他人走远了，但他响亮的声音仍在我耳际回荡。

sentences.en: The evening was a resounding success.
